value.title: DAX Fridays! #78: When should I use FILTER() with CALCULATE?

As you probably have noticed, sometimes people use a column in the filter part of CALCULATE and sometimes they use the FILTER function.  The question is, when should you use what?  In this video I will try to clarify that question.  Dont miss part

value.title: Using Power BI gateways to connect to data sources
value.excerpt: Learn all about the On-Premises Data Gateway and how it is used with the Power BI service. The Power BI gateway can be used to refresh imported data as well as allow you to use DirectQuery or connect live to an Analysis Services mode.

topItems.title: Get started with the Power BI Gateway
topItems.excerpt: Get to know what the Power BI Gateway is along with how to get it setup for scheduled refresh of imported data.  Free Gateway Cube Sheet: https://guyinacu.be/gatewaystartpdf  Gateway Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-onprem  Gateway sizing: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/guidance/gateway-onprem-sizing

topItems.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?
topItems.excerpt: Confused about what a Power BI Gateway cluster is? Have your On-Premises Data Gateway installed but it's overloaded? This video is for you!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-high-availability-clusters  PowerShell: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-powershell-support

topItems.title: Using Single Sign-on with the Power BI Gateway

value.title: Get data with Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: How can you find, collect, and clean data from different sources? Power BI is a tool for making sense of your data. You will learn tricks to make data-gathering easier.

value.title: A cleaner way to import files from a  SharePoint folder with a Power Query function

value.title: Dynamic titles with multiple slicers or filters in Power BI
value.excerpt: We've talked about dynamic titles in Power BI before. But, what if you wanted to combine multiple values into that dynamic title. Patrick shows you how using a little DAX!  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/dynamictitlesample  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************

value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX.  Chris Cook - @Finalyst89  Scott Senkeresty – @ScottSenkeresty  Dynamically changing chart axis http://tinylizard.com/dynamically-changing-chart-axis/

value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
value.excerpt: In this video, I go over the embed a dashboard sample and walk you through how to actually embed a dashboard into your application. This uses a combination of the Power BI REST APIs and the JavaScript API.  Embed Dashboards in Your Applications to Monitor Your Business in Context (Blog) - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/embed-dashboard/

value.title: Let's fix signing up for Power BI without a work email
value.excerpt: We look at how you can sign up for Power BI without a work email. value.title: Power BI on a Mac?
value.excerpt: Want to run Power BI on a mac? We look at what your options are to get Power BI Desktop running on your mac. You have a few choices. value.title: Working with Time Periods in Power BI

value.title: Become Better with DAX- No More Struggles!
value.excerpt: Learn how to create advanced DAX calculations by mastering the fundamentals.

topItems.title: How to Use CALCULATE in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This is one of the most import function to master in Power BI. You can filter your data and create complex measure such as year over year comparisons with ease with these easy to follow tutorial. More more help this function.
